message: Let's split it fairly! I'll take 60 and you get 40. It's a good deal for both of us to start.
My turn! I'll be generous, let's split it 55/45. It's a better deal for both of us than the previous one.
Alright, Bob. Let's settle this. I'll give you 45 and I'll take 55. This is the fairest offer I'll make, given the dwindling value.
